casebody.data:
BAYVIEW LOAN SERVICING, LLC
v.
David T. BAILEY et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 12, 2017

Michael D. Day, in support of the petition.

Erin A. Mutty, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 904, 153 A.3d 67 (2017), is denied.
